scripts.compile-ts: cd frontend; find . -name "*.ts" | xargs ../node_modules/.bin/tsc --module commonjs; cd ../
scripts.bundle-client: cd frontend; ../node_modules/.bin/browserify main.js -t reactify -o static/js/main.js; cd ../
scripts.bundle-client-prod: cd frontend; ../node_modules/.bin/browserify main.js -g uglifyify -t reactify -o static/js/main.js; cd ../
scripts.serve: npm run-script make && cd frontend/static && python -m SimpleHTTPServer && cd ..
scripts.make: npm run-script compile-ts && npm run-script bundle-client-prod
